task-manager.title: Task and Project Manager with Calendar
task-manager.description: Created decluttered task and project manager, with calendar view
bulletPoints: Created decluttered task and project manager
Calendar view shows tasks allocated to that day.
Uses: MySQL database, PHP for built and database requests
Uses: Javascript Web Components, Drag and Drop API, Fetch API, Touch Events
task-manager.problem: Current available task managers never quite fit my needs
task-manager.goal: Create decluttered task manager with kanban boards and calendar. Focus on clean, minimal design. I want to not be distracted by how it looks or it displaying or asking for more than I truly need
task-manager.process:
Originally built in Preact storing tasks in localStorage, however I later rebuilt the project in PHP with MySQL database for more persistance.

I started by making a basic design in Figma, including light/dark mode. Tested basics of Drag and Drop API, saving data to localStorage, and context updating. Once I decided I wanted more persistance and to be able to use the same information on mobile and desktop, I rebuilt with PHP and a MySQL database.
task-manager.reflection: Overall the project solves the problem it set out to. There are still parts which are works in progress, and more additions I would like to add. If (when) I rework it I would likely created a Laravel project instead as I've now had some experience with this and appreciate what it has to offer.

ind-appointment-checker.title: IND Appointment Checker
bulletPoints: View earliest available appointment at chosen locations
Multiple locations can be viewed at once to allow user to make an informed decision of where to book their appointment
Compared to IND website reduces number of clicks to view all necessary data
ind-appointment-checker.description: Easy to use website to see soonest available appointment at all IND desks. Easily seen an overview of available appointments and compare between desks to help inform users where to book (when the choice is available

walkers-creek.title: PHP Retail Web Store with Laravel Backend
bulletPoints: Uses mix of PHP and Javascript Web Components with Stripe payment system
Frontend site calls MySQL database for products and home page layout
Database response is saved to session to reduce unnecessary calls
On page change checks if any database changes have happened, recalls and resaves products and layout data if true
